name: scroll-lock
title: Scroll Lock
description: Scroll Lock primitive for preventing body scroll on web.

files.content:
/**
 * usage:
 * useScrollLock(true) // locks scroll
 * useScrollLock(false) // unlocks scroll
 */
export type UseScrollLock = (lock: boolean) => void

import { Platform } from "react-native"
import { useScrollLock as useScrollLockNative } from "./use-scroll-lock.native.js"
import { useScrollLock as useScrollLockWeb } from "./use-scroll-lock.web.js"

export const useScrollLock =
  Platform.OS === "web" ? useScrollLockWeb : useScrollLockNative
